registration.form.error.required.message: Please fill in all required fields
registration.form.error.required.description: Error message when required fields are missing

registration.form.success.message: Registration successful! We have registered you in our participant database.

registration.form.error.failed.message: Registration failed. Please try again later.

registration.form.success.details.message: We have registered you in our participant database and will inform you about the next steps.

registration.form.eventUpdates.message: Yes, I would like to receive information about similar events after the event and participate in the feedback survey. (Withdrawal possible at any time)

registration.page.description.message: Register for the GovTech Hackathon and help shape the public sector

registration.header.description.message: Be part of the initiative to modernize the public sector

registration.section.description.message: Register for the GovTech Hackathon and become part of our community. We will keep you informed about upcoming events, challenges and important updates.

privacy.page.description.message: Privacy Policy for the GovTech Hackathon

events.page.description.message: Discover our events in the run-up to the GovTech Hackathon

events.header.description.message: Prepare for the hackathon and network with like-minded people

events.intro.text.message: The GovTech Hackathon is accompanied by various events that help you prepare optimally and get to know other participants.

events.comingSoon.text.message: We are currently working on an exciting event program for you. Check back soon or register to receive updates.

events.cta.title.message: Become part of the GovTech ecosystem

events.cta.text.message: Register now and be the first to know when we announce new events. Participation in the preparatory events is free of charge.

home.page.description.message: Open Government Hackathon – Boost the Public Sector

home.hero.subtitle.message: The Hackathon on October 11 & 12, 2025 in Saarland

home.hero.explanation.message: In the heart of Europe, where Germany, France and Luxembourg meet, we are shaping the future of the public sector. Saarland as an innovative technology location and bridge between cultures offers the perfect setting for our GovTech Hackathon - an intensive creative and programming marathon where visionary minds from various disciplines develop groundbreaking solutions for tomorrow's digital administration in just 48 hours.

home.terminal.comment.message: # Mark your calendar: The GovTech event of the year!

home.terminal.output.message: It starts on October 11, 2025: In just 48 hours, we will develop new solutions together for pressing challenges in the public sector. Be there when creativity and technology meet - and help shape tomorrow's future.
